name: Nostalgia: An UNDERTALE fan game
description:
Arrow Keys: Move

Z: Accept

X: Back/Skip(Sometimes)

-------------------------------2   ENDINGS!----------------------------

PEACE

ULTIMATE DOOMSDAY

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Genocide route is almost done. But Sans's will... the will for you to come back as the merciful person you actually are has resurrected him. You must decide to kill everyone... or don't. This game has 2 endings! Enjoy them both, as you chose: Chara or Frisk. Your regret, determination, and nostalgia will be very large!
